events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund since this product does not meet my needs.
The issue was classified as a refund request based on the customer's mention of wanting money back for the incorrect item.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund request case for the customer.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’d like to help you get this resolved.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so that I can verify the mistake?
Sure, my order number is 4587932 and I have attached a photo showing that I received a different model than I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund for your order immediately and provide you with a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and handling. I appreciate your help in resolving this quickly.
The refund has been processed, and the return shipping label emailed to you. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with your case closure.
The case has been formally closed as the refund was successfully issued and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
